org.jvnet.hk2.spring.bridge.api

Interface SpringIntoHK2Bridge

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpringIntoHK2BridgeImpl

    @Contract
public interface SpringIntoHK2Bridge
    This service is used to give HK2 spring BeanFactories in which to find Spring services
    Author:
    jwells

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bridgeSpringBeanFactory(org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactory beanFactory)
      Tells HK2 which Spring bean factory to use when finding spring services

    • Method Detail

      • bridgeSpringBeanFactory

        void bridgeSpringBeanFactory(org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactory beanFactory)
        Tells HK2 which Spring bean factory to use when finding spring services
        Parameters:
        beanFactory - The non-null spring BeanFactory from which to find spring services to be injected into hk2 services
